description: A SubmissionStatus is a secondary, mutable object associated with a Submission. This object should be used to contain scoring data about the Submission.
name: SubmissionStatus

id.description: The unique, immutable Synapse ID of the Submission.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. The eTag changes every time an SubmissionStatus is updated; it is used to detect when a client's copy of an SubmissionStatus is out-of-date.

modifiedOn.description: The date on which this SubmissionStatus was last modified.

status.description: The current state of this Submission.
status.name: Status

score.description: This field is deprecated and should not be used. Use the 'annotations' field instead.

report.description: This field is deprecated and should not be used. Use the 'annotations' field instead.

annotations.description: Annotations on this Submission. Each Annotation may be marked as private or public.
annotations.name: Annotations

entityId.description: The Synapse ID of the Entity in this Submission.

versionNumber.description: The version number of the Entity in this Submission.

statusVersion.description: A version of the status, auto-generated and auto-incremented by the system and read-only to the client.
